office_hours.format: In-person (recommended) or online via Google Meet

requirements.additional_readings: Available through Courseworks, Columbia Library (CLIO), or Open Web

discussion_sections.requirement: Must register for UN1611 in addition to UN1601
discussion_sections.absence_policy: Contact TA (not professor) for religious holidays, illness, or emergency. Make-up assignment is a one-page essay.

policies.laptops: Prohibited during lectures except with written permission. Slides posted in advance for printing.
policies.academic_integrity: Follow Columbia College Honor Code. Assignments processed through TurnItIn.

generative_ai.documentation_required: If used, must include appendix showing: full exchange, AI tool used, how it was used, why it was used
generative_ai.violation: Undocumented AI use = plagiarism = grade of 0 (F)
